content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and received a command to google "properties of rivers". My computer returned a list of URLs related to river properties. I received a new command to google "how to be a river". My computer returned a list of URLs related to the query. I then received a command to browse the website "https://www.nationalgeographic.org/article/understanding-rivers/" and ask "How can I be a river?". The website provided information on rivers, including their anatomy, importance, history, and environmental issues, but did not provide information on how to be a river.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to become a river"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dfTPF6IwtRk", "https://www.oars.com/blog/become-river-guide/", "https://crateinc.com/an-in-depth-look-at-how-to-become-a-river-guide/", "https://www.wisemusicclassical.com/work/57009/Become-River--John-Luther-Adams/", "https://www.ziprecruiter.com/Career/River-Pilot/What-Is-How-to-Become", "https://raftthecanyon.com/river-rafting-guide/", "https://www.sariverauthority.org/volunteer/river-warriors", "https://www.usgs.gov/special-topics/water-science-school/science/rivers-streams-and-creeks"]', type='action_result')]
"""
